db4d2ceaf3a7965bb7f0bea5e6cb7cff182b450d44b37","dweb:/ipfs/QmRRMC4uj7eAcLW7chynA3sNEYULMFazdLwQHKHQPyzAbA"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/EnumerableSet.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb2a11b236f073662f5a196995863f51c11d006bf7c3de158b316dfa1506c4b79","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8651649cf0b9efa18c3b01c030276fa320d41adbdc286833417e7f36e357b2f3","dweb:/ipfs/QmafhM2Nd1aP43QVB1eRRZaqRXQKswNfQcWi8U8xjrxCfN"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Pausable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5d1b1dcbc0396f44c1c8d554857f71e3187503bf1e54062bf9ec6782e21f3a08","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9aa7fa580393aab7ca3d9f606f5ab7434d51e1c0f3632a593fca82c80ef8cc4c","dweb:/ipfs/QmRy84N7QfkwBM2AeR7UB5G1PPHdRLi6s1iyzAwCzevcHe"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
@title Artists accepting bids contract for LongboardFamara
 Rules:
 Can only bid for an edition which is enabled
 Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount
 Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder
 Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned
 Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid()
 Only the defined controller address can accept the bid
 If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists
 If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals
 Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found
 On accepting of any bid, funds are split to LF and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported
 If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or whitelisted
 Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition
 Artists commissions and address are pulled from the LForiginals contract and are not based on the controller address
 Scenario:
 1) Config artist (Nico) & edition (1000)
 2) Ivan places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH
 3) Paxi places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Ivan position as the leader, sends Ivan 1 ETH back and taking 1st place
 4) Nico accepts Paxi's bid
 5) LFO token generated and transferred to Paxi, funds are split between LF and Artist

documentation.text:
@dev Public method for placing a bid, reverts if:
 - Contract is Paused
 - Edition provided is not valid
 - Edition provided is not configured for auctions
 - Edition provided is sold out
 - msg.sender is already the highest bidder
 - msg.value is not greater than highest bid + minimum amount
 @dev refunds the previous bidders ether if the bid is overwritten

@dev Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if:
 - Contract is Paused
 - Edition provided is not valid
 - Edition provided is not configured for auctions
 - Edition provided is sold out
 - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder
 Return true on success

@dev Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if:
 - Contract is Paused
 - Edition provided is not valid
 - Edition provided is not configured for auctions
 - Edition provided is sold out
 - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder
 return true on success

@title Artists accepting bids contract for LongboardFamara
 Rules:
 Can only bid for an edition which is enabled
 Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount
 Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder
 Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned
 Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid()
 Only the defined controller address can accept the bid
 If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists
 If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals
 Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found
 On accepting of any bid, funds are split to LF and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported
 If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or whitelisted
 Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition
 Artists commissions and address are pulled from the LForiginals contract and are not based on the controller address
 Scenario:
 1) Config artist (Nico) & edition (1000)
 2) Ivan places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH
 3) Paxi places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Ivan position as the leader, sends Ivan 1 ETH back and taking 1st place
 4) Nico accepts Paxi's bid
 5) LFO token generated and transferred to Paxi, funds are split between LF and Artist

documentation.text:
@dev Public method for placing a bid, reverts if:
 - Contract is Paused
 - Edition provided is not valid
 - Edition provided is not configured for auctions
 - Edition provided is sold out
 - msg.sender is already the highest bidder
 - msg.value is not greater than highest bid + minimum amount
 @dev refunds the previous bidders ether if the bid is overwritten

@dev Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if:
 - Contract is Paused
 - Edition provided is not valid
 - Edition provided is not configured for auctions
 - Edition provided is sold out
 - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder
 Return true on success

acceptBid(uint256).details: Method for accepting the highest bid, only called by edition creator, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the edition controller - Edition provided is not validMints a new token in LFO contractSplits bid amount to LF and Artist, based on LFO contract defined valuesRemoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidderIf no more editions are available the auction is stopped return the generated tokenId on success

addedEditions().details: Returns the array of edition numbers

auctionDetails(uint256).details: Look up all the known data about the latest edition bidding roundReturns zeros for all values when not valid

cancelAuction(uint256).details: Method for cancelling an auction, only called from contract whitelistrefunds previous highest bidders bidremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder return true on success

disableEdition(uint256).details: Disables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from whitelist

editionController(uint256).details: Check which address can action a bid for the given edition

enableEdition(uint256).details: Enables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from whitelist

enableEditionForArtist(uint256).details: Enables the edition for auctions in a single callOnly callable from whitelisted account or LFO edition artists

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

highestBidForEdition(uint256).details: Look up all the current highest bidder for the latest editionReturns zeros for all values when not valid

increaseBid(uint256).details: Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder Return true on success

isEditionEnabled(uint256).details: Check an edition is enabled for auction

manualDeleteEditionBids(uint256,address).details: Manual override method removing bidding valuesOnly callable from whitelist

manualOverrideEditionHighestBidAndBidder.details: Manual override method for setting edition highest bid & the highest bidder to the provided addressOnly callable from whitelist

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

placeBid(uint256).details: Public method for placing a bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is already the highest bidder - msg.value is not greater than highest bid + minimum amountrefunds the previous bidders ether if the bid is overwritten

rejectBid(uint256).details: Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder return true on success

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

setArtistsControlAddress(uint256,address.details: Sets the edition artist control addressOnly callable from whitelist

setArtistsControlAddressAndEnabledEditio.details: Sets the edition artist control address and enables the edition for auctionOnly callable from whitelist

setLFCommissionAccount(address).details: Sets the LFO addressOnly callable from whitelist

setLFO(address).details: Sets the LFO addressOnly callable from whitelist

setMinBidAmount(uint256).details: Sets the minimum bid amountOnly callable from whitelist

withdrawBid(uint256).details: Public method for withdrawing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the current highest bidderremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder return true on success

withdrawStuckEther(address).details: Allows for the ability to extract ether so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from whitelist

withdrawStuckEtherOfAmount(address,uint2.details: Allows for the ability to extract specific ether amounts so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from whitelist
